activities: Contact information such as name, organization, job title, phone number, and email address are collected from clients to establish relationship capital measurements and metrics.  This data is collected from Introhive users only under there explicit consent during contact list synchronizations.

personaldata: On-line and Offline Data - Client name, organization, job title, phone number, email address.
